intro: Sinosenecio palmatilobus, commonly known as the broad-lobed sinosenecio, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, often found in mountainous regions. Its leaves are palmately lobed, giving it a distinctive appearance. It produces small, yellowish flowers arranged in clusters, which attract various pollinators.
